description: QA Automation Script to Fetch Plan Type and Submit Plan Details via API
generationPrompt:
Script Name: AddAdhocPlansToCA
Excel Columns: croppable_area_id, plan_name, plantype_id, plan_type_name, project_id, varieties, schedule_type, no_of_days, execute_when, reference_date, required_days, status, Response

Step 1 [LOGIC]:
  - Logic: Loads data from input Excel, fills NaN values, and adds 'status' and 'Response' columns for tracking.

Step 2 [API]:
  - Step/Variable Name: Fetch Plan Type Details
  - Call GET /services/farm/api/plan-types/{plantype_id}
  - Payload Type: QUERY
  - Payload Example: plantype_id
  - Expected Response: plantype_response
  - Instructions: Fetches plan type details using 'plantype_id' from the current Excel row.

Step 3 [API]:
  - Step/Variable Name: Submit Plan Details
  - Call POST /services/farm/api/plans/non-pops/ca/{croppable_area_id}
  - Payload Type: DTO_FILE
  - Payload Example: [object Object]
  - Expected Response: post_response
  - Instructions: Submits new plan details. 'post_payload['croppableAreaId']' from Excel, 'post_payload['data']['information']['planName']' from Excel, 'post_payload['data']['information']['planType']' from GET response, 'post_payload['name']' from Excel, 'post_payload['planTypeId']' from Excel, 'post_payload['planTypeName']' from Excel, 'post_payload['projectId']' from Excel, 'post_payload['schedule']['planParams']' constructed from Excel, 'post_payload['schedule']['type']' from Excel, 'post_payload['schedule']['noOfDays']' from Excel, 'post_payload['schedule']['executeWhen']' from Excel, 'post_payload['schedule']['referenceDate']' from Excel, 'post_payload['schedule']['requiredDays']' from Excel, 'post_payload['varieties'][0]' from Excel.

Step 4 [LOGIC]:
  - Logic: Updates the Excel row with API status and response, then saves all results to an output Excel file.
